nl_desc: A girl with short black hair, blue eyes, hoop earrings, and jewelry on her head wearing a bridal veil, a white lingerie with bows, is sitting on top of a shota boy with black hair and an orange shirt, who is lying on his back, with her legs straddling him, both are having sex in cowgirl position, the girl is blushing, the boy is looking at the girl with a surprised expression, there are multiple views of the scene, with the top panel showing the silhouette of the girl sitting on the boy, the middle panel showing the boy looking up at the girl with a close-up of the cock thrusting into the pussy, and the bottom panel showing a close-up of the girl from the front, the image is censored with mosaic censoring, the background is dark purple, Akiyama Yuko and Akiyama Yuto are the characters in the image, drawn by Pepper0.
